sentences.en: “If only” I had a gray turtleneck or a pair of purple suede boots, my wardrobe would be perfect and I won't need or want another thing until summer.
sentences.cn: 如果有一件灰色高领毛衫或一双紫色麂皮靴子，那我的衣橱就完美无缺了，直到夏天都无需添置新衣。

sentences.en: Erica : Well I guess I'm just a turtleneck kind of gal.
sentences.cn: 艾丽克: 好吧我猜我只是有一件大约一加仑的套领毛衣.

sentences.en: Gift: An elegant turtleneck to cover up Ariza's neck tattoo for classy events and job interviews.
sentences.cn: 圣诞礼物: 一件文雅的高领绒衣,可以在正式场合或者工作面试的时候盖住他脖子的刺青.

sentences.en: He is wearing a turtleneck sweater and a jacket.
sentences.cn: 他穿着一件高翻领套衫和一件外套.

sentences.en: He was wearing gray flannel trousers, a blue wool turtleneck sweater and a blue blazer.
sentences.cn: 他穿着灰色法兰绒裤子 、 蓝色羊毛套头毛衣和蓝色夹克.

sentences.en: I bought a new turtleneck yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天我买了一件新的高领绒衣.

sentences.en: I prefer a V - shaped collar to a turtleneck.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢V字领,不喜欢高领.

sentences.en: I wore a turtleneck to keep my neck warm.
sentences.cn: 我穿了一件高领毛衣来温暖我的脖子.

sentences.en: She wore a blue turtleneck jersey, blue jeans and brown work boots.
sentences.cn: 她身着蓝色高领紧身衫 、 蓝色牛仔裤和棕色工作靴.

sentences.en: She wore a tight black leather blazer over a black turtleneck stiffly in a ponytail.
sentences.cn: 她穿着紧身黑色皮衣,内穿一件高领宽松毛衣,脑后扎一条马尾辩.

sentences.en: Sweatshirts and sweaters with a turtleneck and a lighter jacket are a good option.
sentences.cn: 圆领运动衫和毛线衫,以及轻型夹克都是不错的选择.

sentences.en: Yes, you can do that in jeans and a black turtleneck.
sentences.cn: 也可以，那你就可以穿牛仔裤和高领毛衣。

trans.tran_cn: 高领绒衣，高翻领，圆翻领
